section_title: Special circumstances of Croatia under Convention Article 4.6:
sentences: On 31 October, Croatia underlined the importance of utilizing UNFCCC Article 4.6 (flexibility for EITs).

On Tuesday, 6 November, SBSTA adopted conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2001/L.8) where SBSTA invites Parties to send views on this matter by 15 February 2002, requests the Secretariat to review Croatia's national communication, and decides to further consider the matter at its sixteenth session.
enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
